copyFile(byte[], String, String) - Method in interface com.rift.coad.daemon.deployment.DeploymentDaemon

daemonDeployer(byte[], String) - Method in interface com.rift.coad.daemon.deployment.DeploymentDaemon
This method is used when a user wishes to remotely deploy a Daemon to Coadunation.
DeploymentDaemon - Interface in com.rift.coad.daemon.deployment
This Daemon allows users to remotely upload either Daemons or any other file to the Coadunation server.
